mapper.select: select appraise_Classify_Name,project_name,major_target,appraise_object,appraise_deptname, ganzhouqu,linzexian,gaotaixian,shandanxian,minlexian,sunanxian,finish_date,case when target_status='0' then '暂存' when target_status='1' then '进行中' when target_status='2' then '已完成' end as target_status from annual_evaluation where project_id=#{projectId}
